prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Coleman Tucker. Distillery accounts, 1765-1856. Accession 29446, Business records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Lent for copying by Mrs. E.D. Baugh, Jr., 12 November 1976.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Coleman Tucker (b. 1767) and James Tukcer (b. 1808) operated a distillery in Dinwiddie County, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This accession consists of distillery accounts of Coleman Tucker of Dinwiddie County, Virginia. There are also Tucker family vital statistics (1767-1814), Pettipool family vital statistics (1765-1786), and a register of slave statistics (1777-1856). See also the Tucker-Pettipool Bible records, Accession 29398.
